subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Robert Karlsson became the first Swede to win the Order of Merit title when his closest challenger, Lee Westwood, could not catch Soren Kjeldsen at the Volvo Masters on Sunday in Sotogrande, Spain. Westwood needed a victory to have any chance of claiming his second European money title, but he shot a one-over-par 72, finishing four shots behind Kjeldsen. Karlsson lifted the Harry Vardon trophy despite finishing 32nd — 17 strokes behind Kjeldsen — after shooting a 75. ¶Ryan Palmer made a 10-foot birdie on the 18th hole to break out of a six-way tie for the lead and win the Ginn sur Mer Classic in Palm Coast, Fla., earning a two-year exemption on the PGA Tour.palmer (AP).
